DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate intervention 1 ) sodium-restricted diet , 2 ) diuretic , 3 ) placebo pill treatment obstructive sleep apnea adult .
DOC.brief_title: Sodium-Restricted Diet Diuretic Treatment Severe Sleep Apnea
DOC.detailed_description: Men apnea-hypopnea index great 30/hour include randomly assign three group : sodium-restricted diet , diuretic , control . The intervention last one week . The diuretic group receive combine spironolactone 100mg plus furosemide 20mg daily . The diet group receive regimen maximum intake three gram sodium per day . The control group receive placebo pill maintain eat habit .
DOC.criteria: Men age range 18 60 year Fullnight inlaboratory polysomnography apneahypopnea index > 30/h last three month Body mass index < 35 kg/m2 Informed consent Already start treatment sleep apnea , include use continuous positive airway pressure NYHA heart failure , class Predominantly central apnea Peripheral venous lymphatic insufficiency Any chronic renal disease Use diuretic substance action central peripheral nervous system benzodiazepine , hypnotic , anticonvulsant , antidepressant , appetite suppressant , amphetamine , antiparkinson agent , muscle relaxant , bronchodilator Stroke within 6 month incapacitate sequelae Any physical , mental social condition impair ability participate trial
